content.question: After the processes, sphere 1 has net charge <math alttext="Q sub 1 " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> and sphere 3 has net charge <math alttext="Q sub 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> . How does <math alttext="Q sub 1 " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> compare with <math alttext="Q sub 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="Q sub 1 equals the fraction Q sub 3, over 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mo>=</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mfrac><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="Q sub 1 equals Q sub 3 " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mo>=</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><msub><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="Q sub 1 equals 2 Q sub 3 " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mo>=</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mn>2</mn><msub><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="Q sub 1 equals 4 Q sub 3 " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mo>=</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mn>4</mn><msub><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="Q sub 1 equals 2 Q sub 3 " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mo>=</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mn>2</mn><msub><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 10.2: Conservation of Electric Charge and the Process of Charging

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
